name: Core Meltdown
description:
Core Meltdown its a simple casual game that will test your reflexes and judgement. Your just a pad rotating around the a core, and you have only one mission: to protect the core from the incoming particles through six levels, each one harder.

·No way back: every hit counts and there's no way to gain health back.
·Many different particles with different behaviours: from straight ones from tricky particles that will change thir course to catch you off-guard.
·Endless: if you ever reach the Sixth Risk Level you may play as far as you can.
·No music: just you in the silence, and the sound of your struggle.
